FuncDef: The ldap-server server-type command sets the LDAP server type. The undo ldap-server server-type command restores the default LDAP server type. The default server type of LDAP server templates that the device creates is AD LDAP.
CLIs: ldap-server server-type { ad-ldap | ibm-tivoli | open-ldap | sun-one }

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the LDAP server type to AD LDAP.
-

Sets the LDAP server type to IBM Tivoli LDAP.
-

Sets the LDAP server type to OPEN LDAP.
-

Sets the LDAP server type to Sun ONE LDAP.
-
